articles.name: Safety Resources for Australian Users
articles.title: Safety Resources for Australian Users
articles.body:
Creating a safe environment for our users is at the core of our mission at Discord. We share this commitment with regulators, safety partners and non-governmental organisations around the world.

The eSafety Commissioner in Australia plays a key role in empowering all Australians to have safer and more positive online experiences. As Australia‚Äôs dedicated online safety regulator, eSafety works together with the private sector to protect Australians from a range of online harms, from cyberbullying to the distribution of illegal material.

As part of our efforts to keep Discord safe, we want our Australian users to be aware of the ways in which eSafety can help them respond to the challenges they may encounter online. You can find out more information about eSafety on their website, including how to make a complaint.

eSafety‚Äôs website also includes a comprehensive list of counselling and support services tailored for Australians.

articles.name: Deceased or Incapacitated Users
articles.title: Deceased or Incapacitated Users
articles.body:
What this article covers:

  • Submitting Requests Regarding Deceased or Incapacitated Users on Discord
    • Requesting Access or Details for the Deceased‚Äôs Account
    • Requesting Account Deletion
  • Billing or Payment-Related issues
  • Requests to Memorialize or Transfer an Account
  • Inactive Account Deletion
  • Contacting Discord Support
  • Further Information

Submitting Requests Regarding Deceased or Incapacitated Users on Discord

At Discord, we understand that dealing with the accounts of deceased or incapacitated users can be a sensitive and challenging situation. We are here to guide you through the process of submitting requests regarding their Discord account while ensuring privacy and security for all parties involved.¬†

Requesting Access or Details for the Deceased‚Äôs Account

Due to privacy and security reasons, we are unable to provide access, disclose personal information, make changes, or share data tied to an account. However, if you have access to the email address associated with the account, you can initiate a password reset. This process allows you to regain access to the account without compromising privacy and security. To learn more about how to reset a password, please refer to this support article.

Requesting Account Deletion

If you have access to the deceased user‚Äôs Discord account you can follow the steps below to initiate the account deletion process:

1. Log into the deceased user's Discord account on the mobile or desktop application or discordapp.com.

2. Enter the User Settings by clicking on the cog icon on the bottom left of your Discord app.

3. Once you‚Äôre in the My Account tab (it should be the default tab), scroll down to the section titled Account Removal.

4. Click on the Delete Account button, and you‚Äôll be prompted to enter the password for this Discord account.

5. After you have confirmed the deletion, you will be immediately logged out of the account and the deletion process will begin.

For more information about account deletion, check out our Support article: https://support.discordapp.com/hc/en-us/articles/212500837.

If you have access to the deceased user‚Äôs email address or if you are writing in from the email associated with the account:

You can request account deletion by including the following sentence in your request:
"I confirm that I would like to delete the account associated with [emailaddress@email.com]." while replacing the email address with the email address in question. Once we receive the request above, we will be able to begin the account deletion process.¬†

If you are requesting account deletion from a different account or email address:

Since Discord prioritizes user privacy and does not collect extensive personal information on our users, verifying the identity and relationship of the requester is crucial. In order to proceed with account-related actions, the following documentation must be provided:

  • Deceased User's Account Details:
    • Email address associated with the account
    • Discord Username
  • Proof of Account Holder's Death:
    • Death certificate or coroner's report
  • Proof of Your Relationship to the Deceased:
    • Marriage license, birth certificate, last will and testament, estate letter, or power of attorney
  • Verification of Your/the Requestor‚Äôs Identity:
    • Valid photo ID or passport

Document Submission Guidelines:

Please ensure that the documents are provided as photocopies or scanned copies. To safeguard your privacy, you can block out any personal information such as birthdays and addresses while keeping names visible.

Explicit Confirmation of Action Requested:

In addition to the required documents, we need an explicit confirmation of the action you are requesting for the account. Please include the following statement: "I request to have the account associated with [email and/or username] deleted."

Billing or Payment-Related issues

If you have any questions regarding billing or payments related to a deceased user‚Äôs account, please visit our support form, select Billing, and choose the type of billing issue that most closely relates to your question.

Requests to Memorialize or Transfer an Account

We do not currently have a feature to memorialize or transfer accounts. However, you can submit the feature as a request to our feedback site found at https://feedback.discord.com.¬†

Inactive Account Deletion

Discord accounts that have not been used for 2 years or more may be scheduled to be deleted due to inactivity. As the Deceased‚Äôs account nears the 2 years mark, their email address or phone number may get an email or text message with a warning that their account is scheduled to be deleted. As long as no one logs into the account in question, the deletion will proceed automatically.¬†

Contacting Discord Support

1. Initial Contact:

  • Please send a support request to Discord Support and provide the necessary information and documents as outlined above.

  • Wait for a response from our support team.

2. Response and Follow-up:

  • You might receive a response from our support team requesting additional information or clarification.

  • If you are able to provide further information, rest assured that we will use it exclusively for the purpose of addressing your request.

3. Privacy and Security:

  • Discord takes user privacy and security seriously. Personal information, documents, and correspondence will be handled confidentially and used solely for verification and processing purposes.

Further Information

For more information about our approach to privacy and data security, please review our Privacy Policy.

articles.name: [Known Issue] Audio Quality Drops When Joining A Call
articles.title: [Known Issue] Audio Quality Drops When Joining A Call
articles.body:
Listening to something on your Bluetooth headset and noticing a drop in quality when joining a Discord call? The headphones are probably switching to the Bluetooth ‚Äúheadset‚Äù profile. This is required for low latency and microphone functionality on most Bluetooth headphones, but it provides a lower quality audio experience.¬†

This is a known limitation of the Bluetooth standard that affects all apps with voice call support. The new Bluetooth 5.3 Low Energy (LE Audio) standard‚Äìsupported by select phones and headsets‚Äìintroduces new functionality to help resolve it. Both the headset and the phone need to support LE Audio. Consult your phone and headset specifications to see if LE Audio is supported.

Support for LE Audio is coming soon to Discord, so stay tuned.¬†

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: How do I know if my headset and phone support the Bluetooth 5.3 Low Energy?¬†

A: Consult your headset and phone specifications to see if Bluetooth 5.3 Low Energy is supported. Both will need Bluetooth 5.3 Low Energy support to preserve audio quality while on calls.¬†

articles.name: 1 Month Discord Nitro for Opera GX Users - 2023 Promo FAQ
articles.title: 1 Month Discord Nitro for Opera GX Users - 2023 Promo FAQ
articles.body:
Starting from December 16th, 2023 (3PM PST) to May 7th, 2024 (11:59PM PST), Opera GX Members can claim 1 month of Discord Nitro on us. Learn below about how you can claim Discord Nitro.

Promotion Summary

Offer Details: 1 month of Discord Nitro on us

Who is Eligible: Users who have had an active Nitro membership or Nitro trial in the last 12 months are not eligible to redeem this Nitro promotion.

If a user has had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting membership active on their account and they‚Äôve never had a Nitro membership, redeeming this promotion will cancel your existing membership, with no credit for any time remaining on that existing membership.

We will not be able to refund any leftover membership time from those, and the user will be forfeiting the remainder of the existing membership when activating the 1 month Nitro trial.

Users who have already claimed a gift from this promotion are not eligible to claim further gifts from this promotion.

This promotion is only available in certain regions. If you receive an "Unknown Gift Code" error during the claim/redemption process, you are not eligible to redeem this promotion. You can learn more at this Help Center article.

Requirements: Claim through the Opera GX browser by May 7, 2024 (11:59PM PST), and redeem in your Discord account by June 6, 2024 (11:59PM PST).

Membership: After the 1 month free trial period, your Nitro membership will convert to a monthly recurring membership, and Discord will bill your payment method for per month until you cancel it. You can cancel at any time in your Discord User Settings. For more info, check out our support article on How to Cancel Nitro memberships.

What does this article cover?

  • What is Discord Nitro?
  • What is Opera GX?
  • How do I claim the Nitro Promo from my Opera GX account?¬†¬†
  • How do I redeem the Nitro Trial on my Discord Account?¬†
    • Eligibility for Redeeming the Nitro Trial
    • Step by Step Redeem Instructions
  • Frequently Asked Questions
    • Promotion Details
    • Eligibility for the Promotion
    • Payment Info and Membership Questions
    • Potential Errors and Other Issues

What is Discord Nitro?

Discord Nitro is our subscription plan that gives you access to special perks that‚Äôll make your time on Discord as fun as ever! Personalize and enhance your experience with popular perks like HD streaming, 500MB file uploads, profile and avatar customizations, 2 free Server Boosts, and more:

  • Custom Emojis
  • Discord App Color Themes
  • Super Reactions
  • Avatar Decorations
  • Unique Server Profiles
  • Server Boosts
  • More Nitro & Nitro Basic perks

What is Opera GX?

Opera GX is a special version of the Opera browser built specifically for gamers. The browser includes unique features like CPU, RAM and Network limiters to help you get the most out of both gaming and browsing. Learn more here.

How do I claim the Nitro Promo from Opera GX?

You should see the Nitro Promo offer in your Opera GX browser through the startpage speed dial or onboarding screen.

To claim this Nitro gift, open an Opera GX browser window. Make sure your Opera GX browser is updated to the latest version!

How do I redeem the Nitro Trial on my Discord Account?

Once you have claimed the promo, you'll now need to officially redeem this promo on your Discord account. You must redeem this Nitro trial by May 7, 2024 (11:59PM PST).

Eligibility for Redeeming the Nitro Trial

This promotion is only available in certain regions. If you receive an "Unknown Gift Code" error during the claim/redemption process, you are not eligible to redeem this promotion. You can learn more at this Help Center article.

Users who have had an active Nitro membership or Nitro trial in the last 12 months are not eligible to redeem this Nitro promotion.

If a user has had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting membership active on their account and they‚Äôve never had a Nitro membership, redeeming this promotion will cancel your existing membership, with no credit for any time remaining on that existing membership.

Users who have already claimed a gift from this promotion are not eligible to claim further gifts from this promotion.

Step by Step Redeem Instructions

If you're eligible and ready to redeem this Nitro membership on your own Discord account, you can follow these steps below to redeem the promo.

NOTE:
- Before redeeming Nitro, make sure you are logged in your own Discord account.
- If you accidentally redeemed the Nitro promo on an account that is not yours, we are unable to provide you with another promo.

Step 1 - Logging into Discord

  • ¬†If you're not already logged into Discord in your browser, you will then be automatically redirected to either:

Register for a New Account

If you don't have an account, you can directly register a new Discord account

Login to your Account

If you already have a Discord account, you can login to your account using your email and password or using QR code login

Step 2 - Claiming your promotion gift

Once you have logged in to your account, you will see a message asking you to claim your promotion gift.¬†

The account you are currently logged in as will receive this gift. This gift cannot be shared with a friend and once claimed, the gift cannot be switched to a different user, so be sure you are on the account you want to claim the gift for. If you want to change to a different account, press on the Switch Accounts.

Press on Next when you‚Äôre ready to redeem your gift on your chosen account.

Step 3 - Redeeming your promotion gift

Review the details of the promotion then press on Next. Please note: if you switch to a different account at this step, you will not be able to claim and redeem the promotion on the account you switched to.¬†

Make sure your payment information is accurate. If your Discord account does not have your payment information, please fill out your payment details. You will not be charged until the free trial ends and the membership renews.

When you've filled out all the necessary information and you're ready to redeem this promotion, press the confirmation button.

Step 4 - Membership Now Activated

After accepting the promo to your account, you'll now be automatically redirected to your Subscriptions tab in your User Settings to see your newly activated Nitro membership on your account.

What if I am an Active Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting Member?¬†

Just to clarify - if you have had a Discord Nitro membership or Nitro trial in the last 12 months, you are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

So long as you have had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting membership active on your account and you‚Äôve never had a Nitro membership, you will be able to redeem this promotion and replace it with the 1 month Nitro membership.

HOWEVER, please note: By choosing to activate this 1 month trial, you will lose any features associated with your current memberships, and **you will not receive a refund for any remaining value on your current membership**.

At the end of the promotion period, you'll be converted to a paying Nitro membership per month unless you cancel your membership.

Frequently Asked Questions

We know there's a lot of information to unpack on this promotion above, so we've also broken down this information in this FAQ section as well too.

  • Promotion Details
  • Eligibility for the Promotion
  • Payment Info and Membership Questions
  • Potential Errors and Other Issues
    • Already Had/Have Nitro
    • Already Redeemed
    • Something's Wrong Here

Promotion Details

Q: How long does this promotion run for?

A: Opera GX users can claim Discord Nitro promo between December 16th, 2023 (3PM PST) to May 7, 2024 (11:59PM PST).

After May 7th, 2024 (11:59PM PST), Opera GX users will no longer be able to claim a trial promo.

Q: How long does the Discord Nitro promotion last for?

A: You must redeem the Nitro promotion by June 6, 2024 (11:59PM PST).

If a code has not been redeemed to the Discord account by May 7th, 2024 (11:59PM PST), it will expire and you will no longer be able to have 1 month of Discord Nitro.

Eligibility for the Promotion

Q: Who can redeem this Nitro trial to their Discord account?

A: Users who have had an active Nitro membership or Nitro trial in the last 12 months are not eligible to redeem this Nitro promotion.

This promotion is only available in certain regions. If you receive an "Unknown Gift Code" error during the claim/redemption process, you are not eligible to redeem this promotion. You can learn more at this Help Center article.

Q: What if I'm a current or previous Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or a Server Boost membership? Can I also take part in this promotion?¬†

A: If you previously had a Discord Nitro membership or Nitro trial at any point on your account in the past 12 months, you are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

If you have had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting membership active on your account and you‚Äôve never had a Nitro membership, you will be able to redeem this promotion and replace it with the 1 month Nitro membership.

HOWEVER, please note: By choosing to activate this 1 month trial, you will lose any features associated with your current memberships, and **you will not receive a refund for any remaining value on your current membership**.

At the end of the promotion period, you'll be converted to a paying Nitro membership per month unless you cancel your membership.

Payment Info and Membership Questions

Q: Why do I need to submit my payment info to redeem Nitro?

A: Because Nitro is a membership plan, at the end of your 1 month trial, we will start your first billing cycle so you can continue to enjoy Nitro on Discord.

However, you can cancel the Nitro membership at any time before the end of the 1 month.

Q: Why do I see a temporary hold/charge on my account when this is supposed to be a trial promotion?

A:¬†We place a temporary hold on the payment method to help Discord confirm the payment method works as expected and to prevent the use of fraudulent payment methods. This charge will appear in your Discord transaction history, and it may appear as a hold on your payment method.

We immediately reverse the temporary hold, and you‚Äôll see that reflected in your Discord transaction history. Your bank may take longer to remove the hold from your payment method.

Note: Banks will usually remove the temporary hold from your account within a few business days.

If your Discord transaction history does not show the hold released after 5 business days, please let us know at https://dis.gd/contact, and our support team will be able to investigate this issue further.

Potential Errors and Other Issues

Q: I see a "Oh no! It looks like you have Nitro already" error when I try to redeem my Nitro promo.

A: If you're seeing an "Oh no! It looks like you have Nitro already" error, that means that the Discord account you're trying to redeem this promotion on currently has a Nitro membership so it is ineligible for this Nitro promotion.

Please make sure you're logged into the account that you want to redeem this promotion on.

Q: I see a "Sorry, looks like you‚Äôve already had a Nitro sub!" error when I try to redeem my Nitro promo.

A: If you're seeing an ‚ÄúSorry, looks like you‚Äôve already had a Nitro sub‚Äù error, that means that you've previously subscribed to Nitro on your Discord account and you won't be able to redeem this 1 month perk.

If you have never subscribed to Nitro or Nitro trial, please submit a ticket through our support system: https://dis.gd/contact and our support team will be able to investigate further.

Be sure to include your full Discord ID and email address tied to your Discord account

Q: I see a "This gift has already been claimed" error when I try to claim my Nitro promo.

A: If you are seeing a "This gift has been claimed already" error, that means that the Nitro promo has already been used and cannot be used again. You may need to double check if you've claimed this promo on another Discord account.

Unfortunately, once the promo has been claimed, the promo cannot be re-enabled, and the Nitro cannot be transferred from one account to another.

Q: I see a "Wait a Second...Looks like this code didn't work." error when I try to redeem my Nitro promo.

A: If you're seeing an ‚ÄúWait a Second...Looks like this code didn't work.‚Äù error, that means that the promo is invalid.

Please note that our support team is unable to intervene if you are given an invalid promo and we will not be able to provide a new promo.

Q: I see a ‚ÄúLooks like something went wrong‚Äù error when I click on ‚ÄúNext‚Äù.

A: There are several reasons why you may be seeing this error:

  • You are ineligible for this promotion
  • The promotion is invalid
  • The promotion has reached the maximum number of claims
  • The link is invalid
  • The link is expired

Please note that the Discord support team is not able to assist if you run into this error when attempting to redeem. See the list above for possible reasons why your account may be ineligible or otherwise unable to redeem this promotion.

Q: I see a "Sorry, This Payment Source Cannot Be Used for Redemption" error when trying to redeem my promo!

A: If you're seeing a "Sorry, This Payment Source Cannot Be Used for Redemption" error, that means that the payment method you've selected to cover the temporary $1 hold cannot be used for that purpose.¬†

Please keep in mind that prepaid payment methods, such as Gcash, cannot be used to cover temporary holds due to the nature of how prepaid payment methods function.

For more information on temporary holds, please check out this article!

Q: I see a ‚ÄúLooks like this promotion has reached its maximum number of claims‚Äù error when trying to redeem my promo!

A: If you are seeing a ‚ÄúLooks like this promotion has reached its maximum number of claims‚Äù error, that means the maximum limit for claims of this promotion has been reached and this promotion can no longer be claimed. If you have claimed this Nitro promotion, you are still able to redeem it to your Discord account!

Please note that the support team is unable to assist you if you run into this error and we are not able to increase the limit of claims.

Q: I see a ‚ÄúLooks like your email isn‚Äôt verified. Make sure to verify your email before claiming this gift.‚Äù

A: If you are seeing a ‚ÄúLooks like your email isn‚Äôt verified, make sure to verify your email before claiming this gift‚Äù error, you are trying to redeem this Nitro promotion on a Discord account with an email that hasn‚Äôt been verified yet.

You can check out this support article on how to resend the email verification for your Discord account. If you need help setting up your Discord account, you can read our Getting Started article.¬†

Q: I‚Äôm having trouble with my Opera GX account/browser.

A: Reach out to Opera GX‚Äôs support team here.

articles.name: Voice Channels FAQs
articles.title: Voice Channels FAQs
articles.body:
What this article covers:¬†

  • What are Voice Channels?
  • How to create Voice Channels in a server
    • Role permissions for adding a Voice Channel
  • How to join a Voice Channel in a server
  • How to set a Voice Channel status
    • Role permissions for setting a Voice Channel status

Sometimes you just want to gather with your friends and discuss the latest episode of your favorite show, or play games together. You can easily do all that and more in voice channels! Learn more about not only how to create a voice channel for you and your friends, but also so much more about voice channels!

What are Voice Channels?

A voice channel is a channel in a server where users can connect and chat with one another. You can always tell what channel is a voice channel versus a text channel because a voice channel will be indicated by a speaker icon [].

How to create Voice Channels in a server

There are 2 ways to create a voice channel in a server. Let‚Äôs go over both!

Option 1

1. First, tap on the plus (+) next to a channel category in the Discord server you want to make the new channel in.

2. Then tap on Voice and enter a name for the new channel.

3. Tap on Create Channel when you‚Äôre ready to create the channel.

4. Congratulations! You now have a new voice channel in your server. If you want to move the channel, you can drag and drop the channel to another category.¬†

Option 2

1. Right-click on the channel list in the Discord server you want to make the new channel in.

2. Then tap on Voice and enter a name for the new channel.

3. Tap on Create Channel when you‚Äôre ready to create the channel.

4. Congratulations! You now have a new voice channel in your server. Creating the channel this way will position the voice channel at the very top, so you can drag and drop the voice channel to move it to a category.

Role permissions for adding a Voice Channel

In order to create voice channels in the Discord server, you either need to be the Server Owner or have Moderator permissions set up. Here‚Äôs how to set up role permissions so your Moderators can also create channels.

1. Navigate to the server that you want to change settings for then tap on the server name in the top-left corner of the app.

2. Tap on Server Settings and then head to Roles.

3. Now tap on the role that you wish to edit.

4. Finally, tap on the Permissions tab and locate the Manage Channels permission. If enabled, this role will be able to delete and create text and voice channels. A check mark indicates the setting is enabled, an x means it‚Äôs disabled for this role.

How to join a Voice Channel in a server

If a voice channel has a lock icon on it, it means you do not have permissions to join the channel.

1. Navigate to the server that you want to join the voice channel in.

2. Tap on the voice channel that you wish to enter

How to set a Voice Channel status

1. Once you‚Äôve joined a voice channel in a server tap on Set a channel status located under the voice channel name.

2. A pop-up will appear where you can type in your status. You can also add an emoji.¬†

Role permissions for setting a Voice Channel status

1. Navigate to the server that you want to change settings for, then tap on the server name in the top-left corner of the app.

2. Tap on Server Settings and then head to Roles.

3. Next, tap on the Role you want to update permissions for and then tap on Permissions.

4. Scroll down until you see Voice Channel Permissions and then look for a setting that says Voice Channel Status.¬†

5. If enabled, the setting will have a checkmark. If disabled, the setting will show an x. If enabled, this means anyone with this role can set a Voice Channel status as long as they are in that voice channel.

If you have any questions about voice channels, or you‚Äôre running into an issue with them, please reach out to our Support Team: https://dis.gd/contact

articles.name: How to Report the Location of Materials for Copyright and Trademark Claims
articles.title: How to Report the Location of Materials for Copyright and Trademark Claims
articles.body:
This article provides details on how to report the location of different content types to Discord for alleged copyright and trademark violations. Using the formats detailed in this article allows the Discord team to review your claim efficiently and effectively, so please use them!¬†

What this article covers:¬†

  • Where to file a copyright or trademark claim
  • How to report a user profile or server element
  • How to report a live stream
  • How to report a message
  • How to report a message attachment
  • How to report an emoji or sticker

Where to file a copyright or trademark claim

For information on how to file your claim of alleged copyright or trademark infringement, please refer to the Discord Copyright & IP Policy here.

In order for our team to review efficiently and effectively, we will need specific formats of information to locate the allegedly infringing material depending on your claim and content type.¬†

Note: Please review the sections before submitting your request.¬†

How to report a user profile or server element

Please provide the following information:

1. The User or Server ID number

2. Identify the specific allegedly infringing element(s), for example:

  • Profile avatar
  • Server icon
  • Server banner
  • Server discovery splash
  • Server invite splash

How to report a live stream

Please provide the server ID and the channel ID where the alleged infringement is occurring in the following format:

https://discordapp.com/channels/server-ID/channel-ID/

If you are able to provide any evidence you have collected regarding the alleged live stream infringement(s), it may assist us in taking action against the allegedly infringing channel(s) or server(s).¬†

How to report a message

Please provide the server ID, channel ID and message ID in the following format:

https://discordapp.com/channels/server-ID/channel-ID/message-ID

How to report a message attachment

Please report the direct link to the attachment, which will appear in the below format:

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/###################/###################

Instructions on how to locate server, channel, and message IDs can be found here.

How to report an emoji or sticker

Please provide the server ID and the emoji or sticker link.¬†

To find the emoji or sticker link, right click on the emoji or sticker, select 'Copy Image Address', and paste the resulting URL into your request. The resulting URL should match the below formats:

https://cdn.discordapp.com/emojis/################.png?v=#

https://media.discordapp.net/stickers/##################.png?size=###

articles.name: Free Trial of Midjourney for Nitro Subscribers
articles.title: Free Trial of Midjourney for Nitro Subscribers
articles.body:
Starting from November 27, 2023 (10AM PST) to December 27, 2023 (11:59PM PST), Discord Nitro members can claim 1 month of Midjourney Basic Plan subscription trial.¬†

Read more about the promotion below!

Promotion Summary

Offer Details: 1 month of Midjourney Basic Plan Subscription for Discord Nitro members

Who is Eligible: To claim through Discord, you must be a current Nitro member (unable to be redeemed if you have a Nitro trial membership) and are not an active Midjourney subscriber.¬†

Requirements:

Claim through Discord Gift Inventory from November 27, 2023 (10AM PST) to December 27, 2023 (11:59PM PST), and redeem in your Midjourney account by January 3, 2024 (11:59PM PST).

Subscription:

After the 1 month free period, your Midjourney Basic Plan subscription will not automatically renew. Plans may be continued by purchasing a monthly or annual subscription following the free month period. Images generated will be retained even if the subscription is not renewed.

What this article covers:

  • What is Discord Nitro?
  • What is Midjourney?¬†
  • How do I claim the month-long Midjourney Basic Plan Subscription in Discord?
    • Eligibility for Claiming this Promotion in Discord
    • Step By Step Claim Instructions
    • Eligibility for Redeeming the Midjourney Basic Plan free month¬†
  • How do I redeem the Midjourney Basic Plan Subscription on my Midjourney Account?
  • Frequently Asked Questions
    • Promotion Details
    • Eligibility for the Promotion
    • Claiming and Redemption Process
    • Potential Errors and Other Issues

What is Discord Nitro?

Discord Nitro is our subscription plan that gives you access to special perks that‚Äôll make your time on Discord as fun as ever! Personalize and enhance your experience with popular perks like HD streaming, 500MB file uploads, profile and avatar customizations, 2 free Server Boosts, and more:

  • Custom Emojis
  • Discord App Color Themes
  • Super Reactions
  • Avatar Decorations
  • Unique Server Profiles
  • Server Boosts
  • More Nitro & Nitro Basic perks

What is Midjourney?

Midjourney is an independent research lab that aims to expand the imaginative powers of the human species. It enables people to reveal and explore their own creativity by generating rich images from short descriptions to illustrate anything that you can imagine.

How do I claim the month-long Midjourney Basic Plan Subscription in Discord?

Eligibility for the Claiming this Promotion in Discord

In order to claim this code, you'll need to be an active member to Discord Nitro (you can be either a monthly or yearly Nitro member), not under a Nitro trial membership, and not an active Midjourney subscriber.

  • If you are an active Discord Nitro member, the code must be claimed in the Gift Inventory by December 27, 2023 (11:59PM PST)
    • Otherwise, the code will not be available to claim after December 27, 2023 (11:59PM PST)

Unfortunately, if you are a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting member, you'll need to subscribe to Nitro in order to claim this promotion.

Step By Step Claim Instructions¬†

1. Log in to Your Discord account and head to the Gift Inventory tab.¬†

If you‚Äôre subscribed to Discord Nitro, start by logging into your Discord account.¬†

You may notice a notification bar at the top of your browser/desktop app. Press the "Take me there" button in the notification bar to be redirected to your Gift Inventory.¬†

For both the desktop/browser app and mobile app, you can also directly head to your User Settings, and then select Gift Inventory.

2. Press on the Claim button to reveal the 1 month Midjourney Basic Plan Subscription gift code

In the Gift Inventory, you‚Äôll find the Midjourney Basic Plan Subscription gift. You can press on the Claim button next to the gift to reveal the unique gift code, which you can immediately redeem by pressing on the Redeem button.

If you want to redeem your code later, you can press the Maybe Later button, and then redeem the code before December 27, 2023 (11:59PM PST).

3. After copying the code, press on Redeem to head to the Midjourney website and sign in with your Discord account.

4. After signing in, you‚Äôll be able to redeem the code fully to your Midjourney account by tapping on Confirm.

5. Finally, enter your payment information and then tap on Start trial when completed. Though the checkout page states that this subscription will automatically renew, this is inaccurate. The subscription will not renew automatically and must be reactivated after the end of the month

Eligibility for Redeeming the Midjourney Basic Plan free month¬†

To redeem the 1 month Midjourney Basic Plan Subscription code, you must not currently have an active Midjourney subscription.

Note: If you're running into any issues when attempting to redeem this promotion, and you believe that your Midjourney account meets the promotion requirements, reach out to the Midjourney support team to review your Midjourney account further: billing@midjourney.com

How do I redeem the Midjourney Basic Plan Subscription on my Midjourney Account?

Once you have claimed the code in the Discord Gift Inventory, you'll now need to officially redeem this code on your Midjourney account.

1. Press on Redeem to head to the Midjourney website and sign in with your Discord account.

2. After signing in, you‚Äôll be able to redeem the code fully to your Midjourney account by tapping on Confirm.

3. Finally, enter your payment information and then tap on Start trial when completed.

Frequently Asked Questions

We know there's a lot of information to unpack on this promotion above, so we've also broken down this information in this FAQ section as well too.

  • Promotion Details
  • Eligibility for the Promotion
  • Claiming and Redemption Process
  • Potential Errors and Other Issues

Promotion Details

Q: How long does this promotion for Discord Nitro members run for?

A: This promotion runs from November 27, 2023 (10AM PST) to December 27, 2023 (11:59PM PST).

After January 3, 2024 (11:59PM PST), Nitro members will no longer be able to claim a subscription code.

Q: How long does my Midjourney Basic Plan Subscription code last for in my Discord Gift Inventory?

A: Once a code is claimed in the Gift Inventory in Discord, all Midjourney Basic Plan Subscription codes must be redeemed by December 27, 2023 (11:59PM PST).

If a code has not been redeemed to the Midjourney account by December 27, 2023 (11:59PM PST), it will expire and you will no longer be able to claim 1 month of the Midjourney Basic Plan Subscription.

Eligibility for the Promotion

Q: Who can claim this promotion in the Discord Gift Inventory?

A: All current and new Discord Nitro members who are not active Midjourney subscribers are eligible for this perk.¬†

This does not include Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boost-only members.

Q: Who can redeem this Midjourney Basic Plan Subscription to their Midjourney account?

A: This offer is open to users who do not have an active Midjourney subscription.

Q: Can I redeem the Midjourney Basic Plan Subscription to my Midjourney account in my region?¬†

A: All users outside of Cuba, Iran, North Korea, Syria, Ukraine, Russia and the Crimea, Donetsk, and Luhansk Regions may claim this promotion. These restrictions are placed by Midjourney‚Äôs payment processor and may be read in detail here.¬†

Claiming and Redemption Process

Q: On which Discord platforms can I claim this promotion?

A: You'll be able to claim the promo on the mobile, browser, and desktop version of the Discord app.¬†

Potential Errors and Other Issues

Q: What if I don't see the 1 Month Midjourney Basic Plan Subscription code in my Discord Gift Inventory?¬†

A: In order to claim this code through Discord,¬† you must be a current Nitro member (unable to be redeemed if you have a Nitro trial membership) and not be an active Midjourney subscriber.¬†

If you are an active Discord Nitro member, make sure to refresh your Discord client to double check if an update was needed.

Q: What if I'm still running into issues after refreshing my Discord client?¬†

A: If the refresh does not work, please submit a ticket through our support system at: https://dis.gd/contact and our support team will be able to investigate further. Be sure to submit the ticket using the email address associated with your Discord account, and send us a screenshot of the following: Your My Account tab and your Gift Inventory tab.

Q: I'm having trouble redeeming this promotion to my Midjourney account. How do I contact Midjourney support?¬†

A: If you are having issues redeeming this promotion on your Midjourney account, you can reach out to Midjourney support at billing@midjourney.com

Q: When entering my input, the form says that the subscription will automatically renew at the end of the month. Will the subscription automatically renew?

A: Due to technical limitations, the payment screen will display that the trial renews automatically. This is not the case, and is incorrectly labeled.

Q: Will I retain access to my images if I do not renew my subscription?

A: You will be able to access images that you create independent of subscription renewal.

Q: I‚Äôve claimed my trial. Now how do I generate images with Midjourney?

A: Join the Midjourney server at https://discord.gg/midjourney and follow the quickstart guide https://docs.midjourney.com/docs/quick-start.

articles.name: Color Issues in Go Live/Screenshare for NVIDIA Graphics Card
articles.title: Color Issues in Go Live/Screenshare for NVIDIA Graphics Card
articles.body:
On October 20, 2023, we investigated a stream discoloration issue that occurred during screensharing in Discord for Windows users with the latest NVIDIA GPU driver, version 545.84. The outgoing stream can exhibit a loss in color values, creating a wash out image as you see below. This is a possible video encoder regression in NVIDIA‚Äôs 545.84 driver.

If you are impacted by this issue, we recommend upgrading to NVIDIA driver version 546.31 or later as that should resolve the discoloration in your Go Live stream.

You can download 546.31 using the following link: https://nvidia.custhelp.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/5507

To check if a newer driver exists for your system, you can search here: https://www.nvidia.com/download/find.aspx

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: How do I check my NVIDIA GPU driver version?

A: On your Windows device, you can run a DirectX Diagnostic or a DX Diag to find your GPU information along with the driver version under the Display tab of your DX Diag. You can check out this article here for how to run a DX Diag.
